treatment-md.title: Amphibetaeus jousseaumei Coutiere 1896
treatment-md.article-title: A re-description of rare alpheid shrimp Amphibetaeus jousseaumei (Coutière, 1896) and description of a new species of the genus Athanopsis Coutière, 1897 (Crustacea: Decapoda: Alpheidae) from Iranian coast of the Persian Gulf
